translations.chinese: 今諸侯王皆推高寡人，將何以處之哉？」
translations.english: Now all the feudal lords elevate me. How should I deal with this?"

translations.chinese: 諸侯王皆曰：「大王起於細微，滅亂秦，威動海內。
translations.english: All the feudal lords said: "Your Majesty rose from humble origins, destroyed the chaotic Qin, and your might shook within the seas.

translations.chinese: 又以辟陋之地，自漢中行威德，誅不義，立有功，平定海內，功臣 皆受地食邑，非私之也。
translations.english: You also from remote and narrow territory, from Hanzhong displayed awe-inspiring virtue, executed the unrighteous, established those with merit, pacified within the seas. The meritorious ministers all received land and fiefs. It was not private.

translations.chinese: 大王德施四海，諸侯王不足以道之，居帝位甚實宜，願大王以幸天下。」
translations.english: Your Majesty's virtue extends to the four seas. The feudal lords are insufficient to express it. Occupying the imperial position is very fitting indeed. We wish Your Majesty to favor the world."

translations.chinese: 漢王曰：「諸侯王幸以為便於天下之民，則可矣。」
translations.english: King Han said: "If the feudal lords consider it convenient for the world's people, then it is acceptable."
